short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily export all links from web pages with a single click using Link Extractor!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your web browsing experience with Link Extractor, the one-click solution for exporting and organizing every link from any webpage. Whether you're a researcher, student, or just love to collect links, our intuitive extension is designed to simplify your digital life.

Features:
- One-Click Export: Instantly grab every link from the current webpage with just one click.
- Seamless Integration: Works quietly in the background, ready when you need it without disrupting your browsing.
- Supports All Webpages: Whether it's a news site, academic papers, or endless search results, Link Extractor handles it all.
- Customizable Settings: Choose the format for your exported links â€“ plain text, CSV, or save them directly to your clipboard.
- User-friendly Interface: A clean and simple UI that requires no technical knowledge. Just click and collect!
- Efficient Organization: Helps you organize links by categories, making it easy to sort and save for later use.

Make web navigation and research easier than ever. Install Link Extractor today and start exporting links effortlessly!
